hasDitaContent.@value: Lymecycline increases the risk of bleeding events when given with acenocoumarol. Manufacturer advises monitor INR.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Lymecycline   increases   the risk of bleeding events when given with   acenocoumarol .  Manufacturer advises monitor INR .
